list.title: Onboard with Ease, Convert More Borrowers

texts.text1: Dashboards are meant to be personal tools for website managers and suppliers to enjoy, and are therefore largely modifiable.
texts.text2: When it comes to customer actions, website administrators can choose the permissions of each supplier, allowing them to limit or empower commerce activity as needed.
